info.author: Alex Pizarro
info.description:
# split-git-commit

## Description

WIP

## Example run

```bash
$ python3.9 -m pip install split_git_commit
$ cd ~/code/django
$ split-git-commit

Target commit: 628e74c8caa349315ff126c732c9055c8ce324e5
```

info.name: split-git-commit
info.summary: A tool to automatically split large Git commits.
